description: Adds a provisioned concurrency configuration to a function's alias or version.

parameters.name: FunctionName
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the Lambda function. Function name --- my-function. Function ARN --- arn:aws:lambda:us-west-2:123456789012:function:my-function. Partial ARN --- 123456789012:function:my-function. The length constraint applies only to the full ARN. If you specify only the function name, it is limited to 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Qualifier
parameters.description: The version number or alias name.

parameters.name: ProvisionedConcurrentExecutions
parameters.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency to allocate for the version or alias.

nested_items.name: RequestedProvisionedConcurrentExecutions
nested_items.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency requested.

nested_items.name: AvailableProvisionedConcurrentExecutions
nested_items.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency available.

nested_items.name: AllocatedProvisionedConcurrentExecutions
nested_items.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency allocated. When a weighted alias is used during linear and canary deployments, this value fluctuates depending on the amount of concurrency that is provisioned for the function versions.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the allocation process.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: For failed allocations, the reason that provisioned concurrency could not be allocated.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time that a user last updated the configuration, in ISO 8601 format.
